python3 -m venv venv-noted
. venv-noted/bin/activate
pip install noted-dev
pip list | grep noted
mkdir noted
cd noted/
mkdir logs
mkdir config
mkdir query
mkdir transfers
nano noted/config/config.yaml
find . -name params.ini
nano ./venv-noted/lib/python3.8/site-packages/noted/params/params.ini
noted -h
noted noted/config/config.yaml &
